definitions.definition: To gain (success, reward, recognition) through applied effort or work.
definitions.example: You can have the s'mores: you earned them, clearing the walkway of snow so well.
He earns seven million dollars a year as CEO.  My bank account is only earning one percent interest.
Now that you are earning, you can start paying me rent.

definitions.definition: To cause (someone) to receive payment or reward.
definitions.example: My CD earns me six percent!

definitions.definition: To achieve by being worthy of.
definitions.example: to earn a spot in the top 20
